name: Pancake Phlip
description:
Become a world champion pancake flipper by flipping your pancakes at the right time! When the bar reaches the indicator, click to flip! Make the crowd go wild, or face their wrath as you see how many successful pancakes you can make within a minute!

Robert Guan - Taste Tester (Programmer)

Jake Nguyen - Pan Flipper (Tech Artist)

Karina Teruya - Venue Supplier (Artist)
